onChange.script:
import re
	import traceback
	self.view.params.func_new_data = False
	if self.custom.func_save_partial:
		try:
			#system.perspective.print('Partial Registration Save')
			project = "RITI"
			### Declare parameters 
			
			user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
			first_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.first_name
			middle_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.middle_name
			last_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.last_name
			suffix_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.suffix_name
			nick_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.nick_name
			gender_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.gender_id
			dob = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.dob
			dob_quality = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.dob_quality_id
			ssn = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ssn
			ssn_quality = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ssn_quality_id
			race = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.race_id
			ethnicity = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ethnicity_id
			veteran = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.veteran_id
			disability = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.disability_id
			participant_phone = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.phone
			participant_phone_alt = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.phone_alt
			participant_email = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.email
			preferred_communication = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.communication_type_id
			
			referral_provider_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.referral_provider_id
			referral_status_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.referral_status_id
			referral_type_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.referral_type_id
			
			emergency_contact_name = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_name
			emergency_contact_email = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_email
			emergency_contact_phone = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_phone
			emergency_contact_type = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_type_id
			
			family_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.family_id
			hoh_relationship_id = self.view.custom.RegistrationData.hoh_relationship_id
			
			
			## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
			if None in [gender_id,first_name,last_name]:
				valid = False
				#system.perspective.print('Null Error')
				error_message = "Please fill in all the mandatory fields correctly before saving."
			elif gender_id < 0:
				valid = False
				#system.perspective.print('Gender Error')
				error_message = "Please fill in the Participant Gender before saving."
			elif first_name.strip() == "":
				valid = False
				#system.perspective.print('First Name Error')
				error_message = "Please fill in the Participant First Name before saving."
			elif last_name.strip() == "":
				valid = False
				#system.perspective.print('Last Name Error')
				error_message = "Please fill in the Participant Last Name before saving."
			else:
				valid = True
			### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
			if valid:
			
				## Convert Phone numbers to numeric value only
				participant_phone = normalize.phone(participant_phone)
				participant_phone_alt = normalize.phone(participant_phone_alt)
				emergency_contact_phone = normalize.phone(emergency_contact_phone)
				#
				#Set non-null allowed values to 'Data Not Collected"
				if preferred_communication == -1:
					preferred_communication = None
				if disability == -1:
					disability = None
				if dob_quality == -1:
					dob_quality = 6
				if emergency_contact_type == -1:
					emergency_contact_type = None
				if ethnicity == -1:
					ethnicity = 4
				if family_id == -1:
					family_id = None
				if hoh_relationship_id == -1:
					hoh_relationship_id = 8
				if race == -1:
					race = 8
				if referral_provider_id == -1:
					pass
				if referral_status_id == -1:
					pass
				if referral_type_id == -1:
					pass
				if ssn_quality == -1:
					ssn_quality = 6
				if veteran == -1:
					veteran = 4
				#SSN validation and normalization
				ssn = normalize.ssn(ssn)
				#system.perspective.print(ssn)

				#DOB validation	
				try:
					dob = system.date.parse(dob)
					#system.perspective.print('DOB sucessfully parsed: ' + str(dob))
				except:
					dob = '1900-01-01 00:00:00'
					#system.perspective.print('DOB set to default: ' + str(dob))
				
				### Create transaction
				transactionFailed = False
				success = False
				txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)
				try:
					#Insert the Human Data
					path = "Participants/Registration/Insert New Human"
					parameters = {"first_name":first_name,
								"middle_name":middle_name,
								"last_name":last_name,
								"suffix_name":suffix_name,
								"nick_name":nick_name,
								"dob":dob,
								"dob_quality":dob_quality,
								"ssn":ssn,
								"ssn_quality":ssn_quality,
								"gender_id":gender_id,
								"race_id":race,
								"ethnicity_id":ethnicity,
								"veteran_id":veteran,
								"disability_id":disability,
								"phone":participant_phone,
								"alt_phone":participant_phone_alt,
								"email":participant_email,
								"communication_type_id":preferred_communication,
								"emergency_contact_name":emergency_contact_name,
								"emergency_contact_email":emergency_contact_email,
								"emergency_contact_phone":emergency_contact_phone,
								"emergency_contact_type_id":emergency_contact_type,
								"family_id":family_id,
								"hoh_relationship_id":hoh_relationship_id}
					human_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
					#Insert the new participant data
					path = "Participants/Registration/InsertNewParticipant"
					parameters = {"human_id":human_id}
					participant_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
					'''
					#
					#Removed referrals on add new participant - not sure, so leaving it here
					#
					#Insert the referral if the information was provided
					if referral_provider_id > -1 and referral_status_id > -1 and referral_type_id > -1:
						path = "Participants/Referrals/ReferralDetailInsert"
						parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id,
									"provider_id":referral_provider_id,
									"status_id":referral_status_id,
									"type_id":referral_type_id,
									"program_id":3}
						referral = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
						#Insert the first entry inotreferral log
						status_id = referral_status_id
						time_created = system.date.now()
						comment = "Automatic referral log entry on new participant addition"
						referral_id = referral
						path = "Participants/Referrals/ReferralDetailNoteInsert"
						parameters = {"comment":comment,
									"referral_id":referral_id,
									"status_id":status_id,
									"type_id":referral_type_id,
									"time_created":time_created,
									"user_name":user_name}
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId, getKey=True)
						'''
				#Transaction failure :(
				except:
					transactionFailed = True
					logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants RegisterParticipant Button Save")
					msg = traceback.format_exc()
					logger.error(msg)
					
				### Check if an error occured rollback the transaction
				if transactionFailed:
					system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
					payload = {'message':"Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again."}
					system.perspective.sendMessage("showError", payload=payload, scope="view")
				### Otherwise commit 
				else:
					#Success!!!!
					system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
					payload = {'message':"Participant Added Successfully"}
					system.perspective.sendMessage("showError", payload=payload, scope="view")
					success = True

				### Always close the transaction	
				system.db.closeTransaction(txId)
				# If successful reset and close the dock
				if success:
					self.view.params.func_new_data = False
					system.perspective.sendMessage("ResetSearch", payload={}, scope="session")
					system.perspective.sendMessage("ResetRegistration", payload={}, scope="session")
					system.perspective.closeDock('RegisterParticipant')
					#Go to the detail view
					tab_id = 10
					system.perspective.navigate("Participants/Detail/" + str(participant_id) + "/" + str(tab_id))
					system.perspective.sendMessage("refreshPersonalData", payload={}, scope="session")	
			
			else:
				#system.perspective.print('showMessage')
				payload = {'message':error_message}
				system.perspective.sendMessage("showError", payload=payload, scope="view")
				#Set the script trigger to false when done
			
			self.custom.func_save_partial = False

		except:
			logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants RegisterParticipant view.custom.func_save_partial")
			msg = traceback.format_exc()
			logger.error(msg)
			self.custom.func_save_partial = False

import traceback
	try:
		if currentValue.value:
			#First name and last name and ssn
			if self.params.first_name is not None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.first_name = self.params.first_name
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.first_name = ''
			
			if self.params.middle_name is not None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.middle_name = self.params.middle_name
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.middle_name = ''
			
			if self.params.last_name is not None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.last_name = self.params.last_name
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.last_name = ''
			
			if self.params.nick_name is not None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.nick_name = self.params.nick_name
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.nick_name = ''
			
			if self.params.ssn is not None:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.ssn = self.params.ssn
			else:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.ssn =''
			#Race if valid, otherwise set to -1
			try:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.race_id = int(self.params.race)
			except:
				self.custom.RegistrationData.race_id = -1
			#DOB
			#Set today as the default birth month and day 
			#as a futile attempt to create a unique birthdate
			dob_year_default = "1920"
			dob_month_default = str(system.date.getMonth(system.date.now()) + 1)
			dob_day_default = str(system.date.getDayOfMonth(system.date.now()) + 1)
			#Convert to default string if None
			if self.params.dob_year == None:
				self.params.dob_year = dob_year_default
			if self.params.dob_month == None:
				self.params.dob_month = dob_month_default
			if self.params.dob_day == None:
				self.params.dob_day = dob_day_default
			#Convert the param is a string
			self.params.dob_year = str(self.params.dob_year)
			self.params.dob_month = str(self.params.dob_month)
			self.params.dob_day = str(self.params.dob_day)
			#fill in any missing information with defaults
			if self.params.dob_year == '':
				self.params.dob_year = dob_year_default
			if self.params.dob_month == '':
				self.params.dob_month = dob_month_default
			if self.params.dob_day == '':
				self.params.dob_day = dob_day_default
			#If not the correct length change to defaults
			if len(self.params.dob_year) != 4:
				self.params.dob_year = dob_year_default
			if len(self.params.dob_month) != 2:
				self.params.dob_month = dob_month_default
			if len(self.params.dob_day) != 2:
				self.params.dob_day = dob_day_default
			try:#Try to make a date. Dating is difficult. Ask any single man.
				parse_string = self.params.dob_year + '-' + self.params.dob_month + '-' + self.params.dob_day + ' 00:00:00'
				#system.perspective.print("DOB string:" + str(parse_string))
				self.custom.RegistrationData.dob = system.date.parse(parse_string + ' 00:00:00')
			except:#Give up. This date is hopelessly fubar.
				#system.perspective.print("Date Parse Exception")
				self.custom.RegistrationData.dob = '1920-01-01 00:00:00'
			#system.perspective.print("Registered DOB:" + str(self.custom.RegistrationData.dob))
			#Set dropdowns to -1 so the selection data type is integer
			self.custom.RegistrationData.communication_type_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.disability_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.dob_quality_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_type_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.ethnicity_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.family_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.gender_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.hoh_relationship_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.referral_provider_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.referral_status_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.referral_type_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.ssn_quality_id = -1
			self.custom.RegistrationData.veteran_id = -1
		self.params.func_new_data = False
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants RegisterParticipant view.params.func_new_data")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

messageHandlers.script:
self.view.custom.RegistrationData.communication_type_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.disability_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.dob = None
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.dob_quality_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.email = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_contact_type_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_email = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_name = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.emergency_phone = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ethnicity_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.family_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.first_name = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.gender_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.hoh_relationship_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.last_name = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.middle_name = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.nick_name = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.phone = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.phone_alt = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.race_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.referral_provider_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.referral_status_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.referral_type_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ssn = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.ssn_quality_id = -1
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.suffix_name = ''
	self.view.custom.RegistrationData.veteran_id = -1
	'''
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("FirstName").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("LastName").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("DateOfBirth").props.params.date = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Race").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("SocialSecurityNumber").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Gender").props.params.SelectedValue
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("DeceasedDate").props.params.date = None
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("MiddleName").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("Nickname").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("DateOfBirthQuality").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("Ethnicity").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Personal").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("SSNQuality").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Family").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("Family").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Family").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("RelationshipHousehold").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Contact").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("ParticipantPhone").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Contact").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("ParticipantEmail").props.params.inputText = ""
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Contact").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("EmergencyName").props.params.inputText = ""
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Contact").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("EmergencyPhone").props.params.inputText = ""
	
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Extra").getChild("FlexContainer Left").getChild("DisablingCondition").props.params.SelectedValue = None
	self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer Extra").getChild("FlexContainer Right").getChild("VeteranStatus").props.params.SelectedValue = None

config.script:
import traceback
	self.view.params.func_new_data = False
	try:
		self.view.custom.func_save_partial = True
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Register Participant Save Button")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

self.view.params.func_new_data = False
	system.perspective.sendMessage("ResetSearch", payload={}, scope="session")
	system.perspective.sendMessage("ResetRegistration", payload={}, scope="session")
	system.perspective.closeDock('RegisterParticipantFull')

props.text: Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.

messageHandlers.script:
import time
	system.perspective.print(payload['message'])
	self.props.text = payload['message']
	self.position.display = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.position.display = False
